001
002package com.commercetools.http.apachehttp;
003
004import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.InputStream;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
010import java.util.function.Supplier;
011import java.util.stream.Collectors;
012import java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream;
013
014import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
015
016import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
017import org.apache.commons.io.input.AutoCloseInputStream;
018import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleBody;
019import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleHttpResponse;
020import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleResponseConsumer;
021import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.CloseableHttpAsyncClient;
022import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.HttpAsyncClientBuilder;
023import org.apache.hc.core5.http.ContentType;
024import org.apache.hc.core5.http.Header;
025import org.apache.hc.core5.http.HttpHeaders;
026import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.AsyncRequestProducer;
027import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.support.AsyncRequestBuilder;
028import org.apache.hc.core5.reactor.IOReactorStatus;
029
030public class CtApacheHttpClient implements VrapHttpClient, AutoCloseable {
031    private final CloseableHttpAsyncClient apacheHttpClient;
032
033    private final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> clientBuilder = HttpAsyncClientBuilder::create;
034
035    public CtApacheHttpClient() {
036        apacheHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
037        init();
038    }
039
040    private void init() {
041        if (!(apacheHttpClient.getStatus() == IOReactorStatus.ACTIVE)) {
042            apacheHttpClient.start();
043        }
044    }
045
046    public CtApacheHttpClient(final BuilderOptions options) {
047        apacheHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
048        init();
049    }
050
051    public CtApacheHttpClient(final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> builderSupplier) {
052        apacheHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
053        init();
054    }
055
056    private AsyncRequestProducer toApacheRequest(final ApiHttpRequest httpRequest) {
057        final String method = httpRequest.getMethod().toString();
058        final AsyncRequestBuilder builder = AsyncRequestBuilder.create(method);
059        builder.setUri(httpRequest.getUri());
060        httpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders().forEach((entry) -> builder.addHeader(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));
061
062        if (httpRequest.getBody() != null) {
063            //default media type is JSON, if other media type is set as a header, use it
064            ContentType mediaType = ContentType.APPLICATION_JSON.withCharset(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
065            if (httpRequest.getHeaders()
066                    .getHeaders()
067                    .stream()
068                    .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE))) {
069                mediaType = ContentType
070                        .parse(Objects.requireNonNull(httpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)));
071            }
072
073            builder.setEntity(httpRequest.getBody(), mediaType);
074        }
075        return builder.build();
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
080        final CompletableFuture<SimpleHttpResponse> apacheResponseFuture = new CompletableFuture<>();
081        apacheHttpClient.execute(toApacheRequest(request), SimpleResponseConsumer.create(),
082            new CompletableFutureCallbackAdapter<>(apacheResponseFuture));
083        return apacheResponseFuture.thenApply(CtApacheHttpClient::toResponse);
084    }
085
086    private static ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> toResponse(final SimpleHttpResponse response) {
087        final Map<String, List<Header>> apacheHeaders = Arrays.stream(response.getHeaders())
088                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(Header::getName));
089
090        final ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders(apacheHeaders.entrySet()
091                .stream()
092                .flatMap(
093                    e -> e.getValue().stream().map(value -> ApiHttpHeaders.headerEntry(e.getKey(), value.getValue())))
094                .collect(Collectors.toList()));
095
096        final byte[] bodyNullable = Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody()).map((SimpleBody entity) -> {
097            try {
098                final boolean gzipEncoded = Optional.ofNullable(response.getFirstHeader(HttpHeaders.CONTENT_ENCODING))
099                        .map(Header::getValue)
100                        .map(v -> v.equalsIgnoreCase("gzip"))
101                        .orElse(false);
102                final InputStream body = new ByteArrayInputStream(entity.getBodyBytes());
103                final InputStream content = gzipEncoded ? new GZIPInputStream(body) : body;
104                final AutoCloseInputStream autoCloseInputStream = new AutoCloseInputStream(content);
105                return IOUtils.toByteArray(autoCloseInputStream);
106            }
107            catch (final IOException e) {
108                throw new HttpException(e);
109            }
110        }).orElse(null);
111
112        return new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.getCode(), apiHttpHeaders, bodyNullable, response.getReasonPhrase());
113    }
114
115    @Override
116    public void close() throws Exception {
117        apacheHttpClient.close();
118    }
119}
